channel.title: Introduction on Sharedmemory
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Sharedmemory

item.title: Terminal file manager
item.description: If you are a terminal enthusiast like me, you appreciate every tool which will make your workflow faster and/or cooler in the terminal. File browsing is something we do day in, day out. This can get tedious, exspecially in the terminal. For me I really like the movement in vim so I was looking for a file manager which support that kind of navigation, so I found ranger, the cli file manager.

item.title: Quick local file sharing
item.description: Did you ever try to quickly share a couple of files from your pc to your phone or vise-versa at home? The following hack will teach you exactly that.
